parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Get array with all items (of any kind, even weapons) from uniform.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''uniformItems''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[uniformItems]] [[player]];</code>
<br>
<code>[
	"FirstAidKit",
	"30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag",
	"30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag",
	"30Rnd_65x39_caseless_mag"
]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[vestItems]], [[backpackItems]]
</value></part></template>
